mapper.select: select a.id, a.job_name as jobName, a.cron_expression as cronExpression, a.bean_name as beanName, a.method_name as methodName, a.status as status, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.creator_id as createId, a.creator_name as createName, a.created_time as createTime, a.updated_time as updateTime from schedule_job a where a.delete_flag=0
